content: Magnus Carlsen retained his title of World Chess Champion. With four wins and seven draws in eleven games, he subdued by 7.5 x 3.5 the challenger Ian Nepomniachtchi, who throughout the competition made some serious mistakes.
translations: ita:Magnus Carlsen ha mantenuto il titolo di campione del mondo di scacchi. Con quattro vittorie e sette pareggi in undici p
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
